content.detailedDescription: The activity has inceased in our home . will be sending photos  and reports tomr. sheets email address. requesting to see mr. sheets on possible investigationhere. also have a daily journal of e m f readings. you can reach me at___-___-____ or if line is busy ___-___-____ cell phone. thanks for your timeand effort. ____ _____
content.summary: very unusal  unknown actity feel it to be alien r

content.detailedDescription: at 615 pm, february 17, 2004, my fiancee and i were leaving a store on the  post road in milford, connecticut. i glanced back through the rear window of  the car and saw a large, white ball, about the size of a half dollar, descend  straight down from above, like a spider i drew pictures of all i will  describe. it had two smaller red lights on either side at the top, and  resembled mickey mouse. it was due east, at about 45 degrees in the sky.We watched it as it hovered, then darted north-east. the red lights disappeared,but the white ball remained constant. we followed it in the car as it moved overthe next town, orange, connecticut. i dont know if it may making any noise ornot.As we got into orange, and were headed north on the post road, it moved acrossthe sky, from east to west in seconds, then disappeared in the west. we werejust about to give up when it reappeared behind us, moving east towards thecoast. there were many cars on the post road, and people were pointing, as ifthey saw it, too.From 630 to 645 pm., it changed shaped againlike a gray pie pan on the bottom, but with the white light on top. it madenumerous stops in the sky, and 90 degree turns. finally, about 645 pm, it movedeast, over west haven beach, and disappeared below the horizon. but we stoppedat home, in west haven, because my fiancee wanted to get the cam-corder in casewe saw it again.While he was in the house, for only about five minutes, it reappeared again,this time from the west. it was again the big white ball, but with only one redlight this time. it stopped completely in the sky for about 10 seconds, thendarted east, heading again for the coast.We followed it, but couldnt keep up - it was moving very fast. finally, overthe water, it moved east again, headed towards new haven harbor, and we didntsee it again.We pulled over on kelsey avenue, and suddenly, two large triangles, about thesize of a nickel appeared. they were coming from the east, moving southwest, butthen began circling and followed the same paths the large white ball had taken.The triangles were only about an inch apart in the sky, one in front of theother. they were charcoal gray, and had small white lights all over the edges,that blinked in rapid successi

Sunday, feb. 15, 2004, at approximately 1600.Rachael wife and i had just parked our car at a parking lot in westminister, ca.To go into a mall in little saigon.  as we got out of the car i felt somethingpulling my attention upward above my head.  i then noticed in the sky, with awhite cloud cover background, a black crescent shaped object erraticallyrotating in a counter-clockwise direction at approx. 15-20,000 foot elevation. i estimated the elevation based on an commercial airliner was flying due westfrom the object creating contrails.  contrails usually start at about the 25,000foot elevation when air conditions are right for contrails.The object would rotate approx. 40 degrees then stop.  then it would rotateagain in the same direction another 40 degrees then stop. then it would do itagain for another 40 degrees.  this continued for approx. 10-15 minutes whilestaying in the same place.  at approx. 1615 the cloud cover broke up and i lostsight of the object.  at first i thought maybe is was a sea gull bird or aballoon but i ruled these answers out due to the object remaining in place androtating, stopping, and begin rotating in the same direction it was originallyrotating for approx. 10-15 minutes.

content.summary: Dead bodies in a mother ship.

content.detailedDescription: Near jeremiah, kentuckyi was outside with my grandmother, both of us were inclined to look south, atthe sky. the object was so bright and colorful i did not have an initialreaction. as the object got closer all i could think was how the object lit uplike a christmas tree. i was unable to move or take my eyes away from theobject. the object passed over us and stationed itself atop a mountain. mygrandmother made me go inside, so i have no idea how much longer the objectremained atop the mountain. the object was disc shaped with solid coloredbrilliant bright lights. the lights were connected next to each other forming acomplete circle around the disc.
content.summary: I saw circular disk of with  different colored lig

content.detailedDescription: We arrived home girlfriend and i after a v-day party.  before bed, i decided tolook out of the window of her apartment overlooking parking lot in an urban areaof charlotte, nc.  having stayed there numerous times, i was familiar with whereutility poles and lamps were located.  i instantly was surprised to see twointense white lights at what i would estimate to be no more than 100 feet in theair.  being familiar with high-intensity lights that are used by constructioncrews late at night particularly road crews, i would estimate their intensity tobe almost that strong.  they were stationary and there was no noise.  i thusassumed that i had missed a tall, unusually intense lamp in the parking lot thatis next door to her apartm. building.  the next morning, i looked out the windowbecause i hadnt forgotten about the lights.  there was no such pole it wouldhave been a strange one, given the height and intensity of the lights.  therewere trees directly under the lights, anyway.  now, i couldnt make out any sortof craft, so much of the above may in fact be inapplicable to this.  i merelysaw two quasi-connected, very bright, white lights in the sky.  because of thebad winter weather, i couldnt have made out any surface details, even if therewere any.  reactions and emotions  i guess i was curiousthe only bit of fear that was there has to do with old unsolved mysteriesepisodes and the like, that i would remember from childhood.  thanks
content.summary: Two bright lights in close proximity to one anothe

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette outside my friends house looking at the stars when the star that i was looking at suddenly dissapeared then reapeared. catching my attention, i suddenly realized that the star i had been looking at had just been blocked out by a large triangular object with moving westwardly and silently through the night sky. when i first saw the object i thought of a b52 bomber because of its size and the angle of the front two sides of the triangle reminded me of the wings of the bomber. it had no lights but seemed to reflect a little of the city light. when i first saw the object i was skeptical that my eyes were playing tricks on me, i removed my glasses thinking perhaps there was some glare but i could still see the object without my glasses. as the object continued its westward course over bloomington, it became harder to distinguish from the night sky as it passed into a area of the sky with less stars. before i had completely lost sight of it i ran to my friends window and started banging on it. by the time i looked back at the night sky it was gone.

My friends and i were playing football next to my house in the early 60s, as achild, and saw a huge object moving slowly left to right accross the sky. it waslarger than a football feild long and silvery in color. we watched as it movedaccross the sky then it went out of sight. the next day the newspaper pressenterprise reported it was a weather balloon. this was no balloon. my wife, whoat the time, lived approx. 12 miles away saw the same type and size object whileskateboarding with several friends. we have never heard of this sighting on anyof the sightings shows and are curious about any similar reports at that time.

Near covington, ludlow, kentuckywitnesses observes three starilike objects approach and de-accelerate to a standstill from their vantage points near the ludlowcovington area. the objects hoverfor a duration, possbily as long as an hour, before moving off.  sighting beganat dusk, lasted until darkness, seen to the north over cincinnati, ohio, and wasbetween late may or early june of 2002. claimants interviewed by researcherkenny young on saturday, february 14, 2004
content.summary: Objects, first thought to be shooting stars, come

content.detailedDescription: I am so sorry.  since the sighting was at 1245, that would mean that the date was february 14, 2004.  thank you for you patience.

This is a correction to the sighting with all the same information.  the sighting occured at 1245, in the year 2004.  all the information in the description of the first report is correct.  i am very sorry for the inconvience

Approx. 2 miles south of ouray, colorado while night hiking off hwy 550 near ourhomes in ouray in the summer of 2001, a friend and i saw a large hovering gray,aluminum-like craft less than 50 feet from us for about 20 minutes as it veryslowly moved south down the canyonvalley that runs along hwy 550 near the alpinetrail head. we were climbing up a steep slope near the hwy to return to myvehical when we noticed the craft behind us.  startled, by the silent closenessof such an obviously scary thing, we immediately returned to my vehical at thetop of the cliffside and watched the craft. it was approx. 503e feet wide by 30 feet tall with a turrent of bluered lights below than seemedto circle around and stationary white lights above. it made absoultely no sound.It wobbled and seemed to be having difficulty leaving. it jumped or hoppedincredibly high into the sky several times and came back each time nearby, allin a brief second or so. i wanted to leave right then but it was mesmorizing towatch.  i wasnt as afraid of aliens as i was of my own government having asecret craft that we shouldnt be seeing. anyway, it finally got up and stayedup.  there, it shot off two distinct red headlights-like beams into thesky..Three times.  other aircraft that seemed and sounded like regular planes,flew above the craft, while the craft shot off those red lights. when the craftwas near to the ground it actually seemed to fade out or hide, but with your eyeon it, one could still kinda-sorta see it. please forgive this...I am not sureexactly the date.  but this i remember...About three or four days later, an odd,wide-spread pink bright light lit up the entire night cloudy sky in montrose, conearby and was reported by many people.We watched the craft until it slowlymoved south and up and out of sight. this is the first time that ive reportedthis event officially.  patricia s. callaway rn, bsn

Near covington, kentuckyufo sightingdate august 11, 2003 - between 730  800 p.M.Location lewis st., devou park, covington, ky kentoncountysummarymr. nick wright name changed, on file reports thatlast summer, on august 11, 2003 at between 730 to 800p.M., an unidentified flying object was spotted in anarea near downtown, cincinnati.Near his residence at 901 lewis st., covington,kentucky, mr. wright observed the very strange object inthe company of two other witnesseshis brother andsister-in-law. lewis street is situated at a highelevation near devou park, which is a main northernkentucky scenic location overlooking the cityscape ofdowntown, cincinnati.The object was first spotted by his brother, who said tothe rest what is thatthe three witnesses, looking to the north-northwest andabout 40-degrees above the horizon, saw an egg-shapedobject holding a stationary position, estimated to hoverabove river road or saylor park, on the ohio side acrossthe river. the object, which was said to make no noise,was brushed or polished aluminum and its pointed end wassituated straight up at a vertical elevation. the centerpart of the object was comprised of a rotating band. ora strip in the middle portion of the object that hadmovement.The witness estimated the object held a stationaryposition above river road near saylor park and may havebeen visible from the clevesnorth bend area. heestimated its altitude to not be quite as high asroutine air traffic in that area near the landing pathfor planes to the greater cincinnati airport inerlanger, ky,  and said it could have been anywherefrom 2,000 to 12,000 foot elevation. from hisperspective, the object was as big as a thumbnail atarms length.The witness said he had plans to run into his mothershouse to retrieve a pair of binoculars. he was gone lessthan 60-seconds and when he returned back outside theobject had disappeared. his brother said that, whiletalking to his wife, he looked away for no more than aninstant and the object was gone.Prior to its disappearance, it was in the same positionfirst seen.Wright indicated that on the day of the sighting, theyhad expected a thunderstorm as some of the clouds werelooking fairly gray.Witness infothe witness obtained contact info for the hotline bywatching the ufo update
content.summary: Ufo sighting object alleged in august of 2003

content.detailedDescription: In mid- september 2003 i was sitting on my porch with a friend and noticed anunusually bright star due north that had what appeared to be about 30 or moresmaller bright light orbs pouring out of it. these orbs of light streaked acrossthe sky and then reversed their directions and began playing and interactingwith each other as if in a dog-fight. it reminded me of those old war filmswhere the planes would fly in formation and then breakaway and engage with theenemy...I am a skeptic at heart and did not want to believe what i saw clearly takingplace.These aerobatics continued for some time and we ruled out all of the usualcauses that might have created this illusion1 neither of us was in intoxicated in any way.2 the sky was totally unobstructed by clouds or moonlight.3 they were not birds or bats due to the velocity of travel across a hugeportion of the sky and the way in which they could stand completely stillthey could veer off in any direction without breaking speed, either.4 i woke up my roommate and had her come and see this orbs also.5 last, but not least, at 6am they all returned to the star just beforedaybreak.I might add also that this occurred just days before hurricane isabelle beganits journey towards our shore. i live one mile from the atlantic coast andisabelle was headed directly for us as a category 5 hurricane. in the lastapproach to our shoreline isabelle reduced to a category 3 and changed course tocome inland above us.I know that these were otherworldly craft and wonder if they usually appearbefore catastrophic events and i also wonder if anyone else in our areawitnessed this same phenomenon.
content.summary: Multiple craft from fixed object in sky

content.detailedDescription: Whatever it was that i saw, i cant really say that it was ufo. it was something,but it was unlike anything id ever seen before. i dont even really know how todescribe what i saw. i can only explain what it was like, not what it was,because there arent any words to fit what it was.Me and four friends were standing outside of a restaurant in columbus arenadistrict waiting for the valet to bring our car around. it was after sundown,and i remember the exact time because we were concerned about missing the playwe were going to. i was 750 pm, so the sun had been down for almost two hours.It was a perfectly clear night.One of the people in my group said, hey, whats that  and pointed almost straightup. i looked up. in the sky were two beams of light.  it looked like someone hada really, really powerful flashlight and was shooting it through a fog bank. butnone of the fog was outside of the shafts of light. they were pretty closetogether, and not perfectly parallel. each of the beams were probably only about15 times as long as it was wide. they were not incredibly bright, but to see thelights at such an altitude, it would have to have been bright.They stood there motionless for several minutes. no movement of any kind. wealso noticed two other beams, of exactly the same size, dimensions andarrangement, but quite a bit higher above the first two much dimmer, off to theside a bit, and rotated 90 degrees counter-clockwise.  these two stayed in placejust like the first ones.My first thought was that an airplane with its headlights on was coming in for alanding at the columbus airport, and was just happening to come through a tinycloud that you couldnt really see. except that the airplane would have had to bestuck in the exact same spot for all that time. when i say that there was nomovement, i mean there was absolutely zero movement.We stood there staring at this phenomenon for what seemed to be 5 minutes untileveryone else got bored and cold. note that we were watching it this long eventhough we had plans to see a play. i wanted to stay and keep looking. it seemedodd to me that the other three witnesses seemed to lose their interest in thebeams.So we got in the car and drove to our destination about 5 minutes away. i kepttrying to see the lights through the windshield, but since they were straightabove us, i could not. when we got out of the car perhaps five minutes later, ilooked up, and they were gone.So there you go, four beams of light, flo
content.summary: Short, stationary light beams, motionless in the c

content.detailedDescription: Aug. 17th, 2001. 12am-2am.  north phoenix, az.  most intense lightening displayin phoenix in 20-30 years according to the next days newscaster.  have videotape of two men in a luxury apartment pool, during intense lightening storm,dissapear in the center of pool when lights go out and come back on.  a shorttime later the lights go out and come on and they return.  the only crack ofthunder hit  at that moment and both men exited the pool and left.  a few thingshappen after this that are pretty interesting.  also, this whole time there is acd playing of my favorite band, tool.  the song plays for about 45 minutesskipping in unison to the lightening strikes and getting stuck on, learn toswim, see you down in az. bay.  it is quite an amazing tape.  after theexperience all i could think about was when b. franklin flew a kite with a keyattached during a lightening storm.  there is much more to this but i will keepit short for now.Thanks......

I was walkin through the woods in the middle of russia... with my friends travisand duffeerobin. all of a sudden this stupid lookin thing came out of no whereand took travis away. i tried to save him but he said he liked it because itgave him a massive head ache. he likes head aches a lot. alright so heres thedeal... aliens are funny... i like to party with them a lot. good day
content.summary: Tienes un pene grande en tu boca

content.detailedDescription: Me was sittin out on me porch when a friggin beer can came out of nowhere andhit me in the head. me bent down to pick it up, and thten me saw a shlovek up inthe sky.  me stared at the shlovek a while, and then after a little bt, theshlovek started to go away.  i screamed get back here you capitialist shlovek,but it didnt work.  the shlovek went away, and i never saw it again.

I was sittin thre eating my chile andi saw it.The many complex shapes stole myboul of chile,so i shot it down with a law, and i am carring it around in theback of my pickup truck along with my chile and bananas
content.summary: Like a giant trangle on a square

content.detailedDescription: Silver disc-like, blue dome top, head visable in dome, hovered

This event occurred on 2102004 2004 is not an available option on the formabove, so i put 0000.  i was driving east on 28 mile road, southeast ofrichmond, at night.  while glancing out my drivers side window, i noticed abright greenish-yellow object in the sky.  it was traveling in an arc towardsthe ground.  in the first split-second, i thought it was a firework--but then irealized it wasnt.  the object was boomerang-shapedv-shaped with the bottom legappearing to be shorter than the top one.  it was traveling with the point ofthe v at the front.  i watched it for approximately 5 seconds until itdisappeared the light suddenly went out.  there were no buildings or treesbehind which it could have vanished.  i continued driving home and reported whatid seen to my daughter.

Approx 2200 hrs, myself and a friend were walking nw through the holbrook golfcourse to the holbrook gas station.  as we approached the parking lot fields,adjacent to cr-19 patchogue-holbrook rd my friend pointed to a light in the skythat was moving strangly ne from where we were standing.  i looked and assumedit was a helecopter search light.  as i watched the object move in the sky asmall white ball of light, it grew many times in size and then somehowtransformed into a large, box shaped object, at about a 45 degee angle from us adistance of no more then three hundred feet.  the object was at tree top leveland clearly visable.  it had a series of some odd shade of red lighting,flickering on and off as it hovered at tree top level.  i felt compelled to rununder it and did so, only to be stopped by my friend, about 50-75 feet fromwhere it was hovering.  we then found ourselves sitting on the ground crying. it was still dark.  after some time had passed, it looked as if it drove away onsome sort of invisible road, in a nw direction.  after the incident we ran homeand told our parents.  no report has been filed ever, i am now 24 and feelcompelled to report it to someone.  i can not get in contact with the otherwitness at this time and am excluding his name and contact info.  after someweeks had passed, we disgussed what we had remembered of the incident, andconcluded that the normally busy road, cr-19, had no traffic on it as theincided occured.  we noticed no sound from anything around us, including trafficsounds and normal night sounds.  this has disturbed me for years.  im notlooking to make a big case out of this, i just want to finally report thesighting.  if you would like, you can call me after 630 pm, est.

Driving home on i-81 south.  entered highway in mattydale, ny.  approx. 18th ofa mile after getting on highway, i noticed 2 large glowingreflective long, thinshaped objects in the western sky my right side.  one twice as long as the otherabout the size of a toothpick held horizontally at arms length.  the smaller onewas ahead and not moving. i looked at the clock on the radio and it was 542 pm.The larger quickly caught up to and passed it on its right heading west.  thelarger craft continued for a distance and then made a sharp left turn towardsthe south. i continued to watch it until they both disappeared behind someapproaching clouds.  i looked at the clock and it was now 544pm.

I had just bought a cannon 8mm camcorder and had seen this done with camcordersa few years ago.I went out to the front of my house on 02.01.04 at about 1030am to 1230pm.I filmed the eve of my house for focusing purposes and for referrances as thesun was behind my house and only shooting in the rays of the sun,to the rightsof the rays. as i was looking from around the view finder, i noticed a shadowcoming up over my house, from the sw and as i found it in the view finder, ithad a light shadow on the bottomwhich you can definitly see the ufo go overhead as i filmed it. it is disk orsaucer shaped. after it passed over, i started focusing again in between thepoints of small christmas light hangers on my roof and a tree in the back of myyard.While doing this there are on filmseveral and i mean several transparent, saucer or disk shaped objects flying inand out of the view finder. one comes in from the left goes half way in the viewfinder then makes an 180 degree turn back toward the left of the view finder.They appear to come from the right going to the left and bottom to top of theview finder. motion can be seen,wobbling,spinning on its axies. they aretransparent and then it looks loke either they change or the sun reflects onthem to small star like lights moving toward and up. their shape is very clearlyof a saucer or disk.
content.summary: Video taped 30 minutes of unidentified flying obje

content.detailedDescription: At the time of occurence, we were situated inside our home parents were gone.Brother noticed it first and had to point it out to me, looked out a window.Object was to the east of the house over a summerfallow field sun was not in ourline of sight, to the south west. curious as to what it was, was aluminum skintype, a round sphere on either end, with a narrow round body between. looked tohave a gondala underneath on which a light pulsed either red or green my brotherand myself argued over what colour it was. no markings but windows were evidentcould not see inside because of lighting. the object coasted slowly over thefield going to the north, then it did a smooth turn back to the south object didnot bank like an airoplane, more like a car turning around. it coasted back tomy original point of referance and then shot off at an extremly fast speed. nosound was heard may have to do with the fact we were inside the house, about a14 mile away. weather was bright and sunny no clouds evident. drew a picture ofthe object for my parants and for my classmates.
content.summary: Barbell shape, sharp and clear sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was at nidas house when my mom called, i thought it could have been a chopper,but not now. i was amazed at how it swung like a pendulum and zipped back andforth, no plane or chopper could do that it pulsed at a far distance red, iwatched it for a long time and then went home, which i could see it without anytrees or clouds or anything, it was amazing to see it, it also had appendagesthat looked like strings that were yellow and i saw little things detach fromit, i couldnt believe it, because i didnt believe in ufos...I dont know, i couldnot think of anything that would do that, my mother seen it too and said the dogwas barking and over his dog house and surrounding area there was a brightyellow light that lit everything up, by the time i got there it was way out inthe west doing its swing and zipping up and down, pulsing red brightly withyellow legs, unbelievable i am not lying

in september of 2002 ted was alone on the shore of irondequoit bay at the  landing at the bottom of the hill at the end of orchard park.  he was carrying  his small 35mm automatic camera.  it was a clear day about 6 pm with a layer  of high clouds.  he was looking east out over the water at a kid on a skidoo.   in the sky above the jet ski, ted saw a strange air object with unusual  movements  in a head on view the object92s outline looked like  ------ e.G. wing, body wing. the angular width was fistsize at arms length, i.E. 10 degrees of arc, at its closest approach.  theaspect ratio of width of wing tips to height of central dome was approximately11 to 1. it was brown in color. the texture of the central dome, as seen at itsclosest approach was about 30 vertical bars side by side, stockade style.  theobject appeared to come straight head on towards ted, growing larger in size,stopping at about 45 degrees of elevation over the water, then retreatingstraight backwards. the width of the bay is approximately 23 mile at the sight.This head on then reverse motion was repeated once more. ted was surprised andtook a photo.  the object then reversed straight backwards into the clouds anddisappeared.
content.summary: A brown daylight saucer photographed over irondequ

content.detailedDescription: All of us were at shool walking our laps...When i witness 1 looked up into theair and saw something...I told my friends to look up at it...And told them itwas a ufoi had been doing research on them and that we were all amazed. now mymother had seen a ufo before with her friend and one of her brothers...And shesaw it in roswell, and it was around the 60s. now there was not only one but 2.We live in texas...And in a very small town. they were very shiny and weresilver...At first we thught it might be a plane...But then we started thinkingwhat the other one was...And we started seeing things in our head...Such assymbols written in senteces...Now i thought that it might be they are sendingeachother messages...And we were picking up the signals, but i didnt know...Andwe kept getting ringing noises in our head that hurt really bad...Also we gotbad headaches. and the letters i saw they saw too...So we wrote them down onpaper. no there werent any lights but it was also during the day...Wich is oddcause most ufo sightings only happen at night. so we were all confused thatday...And lost alot of focus at school.
It surprised me
